flawed_nl_solution:
In two years, Lennon will be 2+8 = <<2+8=10>>10 years old.
Ophelia will be 4*10 = <<4*10=40>>40 years old in two years.
Currently, Ophelia is 40-2 = <<40-2=83>>83 years old.
#### 83

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 38, not 83. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
